actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Public Works, S. Rept. 94-766.

actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for the protection and preservation of the Gruber Wagon Works in Berks County, Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Modifies the project for Blue Marsh Lake, Berks County, Pennsylvania, to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to relocate and restore intact the historic structure known as the Gruber Wagon Works located on Federal lands. Directs that upon completion of the relocation and restoration that the title be transferred to the County of Berks. Authorizes the appropriation of such additional sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the protection and preservation of the Gruber Wagon Works in Berks County, Pennsylvania.
